ruleset.name: Security
ruleset.description: Rules that flag potential security flaws.

rule.name: HardCodedCryptoKey
rule.message: Do not use hard coded encryption keys
rule.description: Do not use hard coded values for cryptographic operations. Please store keys outside of source code.

rule.name: InsecureCryptoIv
rule.message: Do not use hard coded initialization vector in crypto operations
rule.description: Do not use hard coded initialization vector in cryptographic operations. Please use a randomly generated IV.
